def test_add_group(app, db, json_groups): group = json_groups with pytest.allure.step('Given a group list'): old_groups = db.get_group_list() with pytest.allure.step('When I add a group %s to the list' % group): app.group.create(group) with pytest.allure.step('Then the new group list is equal to the old list with the added group'): new_groups = db.get_group_list() old_groups.append(group) > assert sorted(old_groups, key=Group.id_or_max) == sorted(new_groups, key=Group.id_or_max) E AssertionError: assert [1:g;g;g, 2:;...qONw3 sI, ...] == [1:g;g;g, 2:;;...qONw3 sI, ...] E Left contains more items, first extra item: None:name M;headerrzq}v:D'8]5g# U; b;footerpmoZ E Use -v to get the full diff
